mapper.update: UPDATE chi_tiet_xuat_hang SET sys_id_khach_hang = #{sysIdKhachHang}, sys_id_san_pham = #{sysIdSanPham}, so_luong = #{soLuong}, gia = #{gia}, tong_chi_phi = #{tongChiPhi}, ngay_xuat_du_kien = #{ngayXuatDuKien} WHERE sys_id_chi_tiet_xuat_hang = #{sysIdChiTietXuatHang};
mapper.select: SELECT ct.sys_id_chi_tiet_xuat_hang, ct.ma_outbound, ct.ma_pr, kh.sys_id_khach_hang, ten_khach_hang, sp.sys_id_san_pham, sp.ten_san_pham, ct.so_luong, ct.gia, ct.tong_chi_phi, ct.ngay_xuat_du_kien, CASE WHEN ct.ma_outbound IS NULL THEN false ELSE true END AS is_outbound_null FROM chi_tiet_xuat_hang ct JOIN san_pham sp ON ct.sys_id_san_pham = sp.sys_id_san_pham JOIN khach_hang kh ON ct.sys_id_khach_hang = kh.sys_id_khach_hang JOIN purchase_request pr ON ct.ma_pr = pr.ma_pr WHERE ct.ma_pr = #{maPR} AND pr.loai_yeu_cau = 'XUAT';

SELECT ct.sys_id_chi_tiet_xuat_hang, ct.ma_outbound, ct.ma_pr, ct.sys_id_khach_hang, ct.sys_id_san_pham, ct.so_luong, ct.gia, ct.tong_chi_phi, ct.ngay_xuat_du_kien, kh.ten_khach_hang, sp.ten_san_pham FROM chi_tiet_xuat_hang ct join khach_hang kh on kh.sys_id_khach_hang = ct.sys_id_khach_hang join san_pham sp on sp.sys_id_san_pham = ct.sys_id_san_pham WHERE ma_outbound = #{maOB};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chi_tiet_xuat_hang (ma_outbound, ma_pr, sys_id_khach_hang, sys_id_san_pham, so_luong, gia, tong_chi_phi, ngay_xuat_du_kien) VALUES (#{maOB}, #{maPR}, #{sysIdKhachHang}, #{sysIdSanPham}, #{soLuong}, #{gia}, #{tongChiPhi}, #{ngayXuatDuKien});
mapper.select: select ma_outbound from chi_tiet_xuat_hang where sys_id_chi_tiet_xuat_hang = #{sysIdChiTietXuatHang};
SELECT sp.sys_id_san_pham, ctxh.so_luong AS so_luong, sp.ten_san_pham FROM chi_tiet_xuat_hang ctxh LEFT JOIN san_pham sp ON ctxh.sys_id_san_pham = sp.sys_id_san_pham ORDER BY so_luong DESC LIMIT 1;

SELECT
sp.sys_id_san_pham AS sys_id_san_pham, sp.ten_san_pham AS ten_san_pham, -- Thêm cột tên sản phẩm ctxh.so_luong AS so_luong FROM chi_tiet_xuat_hang ctxh INNER JOIN san_pham sp ON ctxh.sys_id_san_pham = sp.sys_id_san_pham ORDER BY so_luong ASC LIMIT 1;

SELECT SUM(ctxh.so_luong) AS tong_so_luong FROM chi_tiet_xuat_hang ctxh
WHERE ctxh.ma_outbound IS NOT NULL
